page.title: 08Tea and coffee operation
page.content: This company is the main industy in the"D"block.It is one of the largest in Europe. The tea arrives at the docks after about a six weeks voyage. It is then delivered to tea companies. The tea is sold and delivered to the tea factories all over England. The blending then takes place.It is blended in a blending drum.Sometimes thirty different kinds of tea are blended to obtain a good blend of strength flavour and colour.Tea tasters are employed in this process. The tea is put in a hopper and the packets are filled and later sealed. The tea leaves are chopped up smaller and put into tea bags then they are transported to shops.
